name: Saturday Morning Roundtrip
description:
This is Saturday Morning Roundtrip, my entry for the VimJam 2020.
In this game, you hike through a 3D, low-poly environment, and take pictures with your camera. Your goal is to collect pictures of eight special places, before you return to your car.

How to play

You will find the list of your target landmarks in your notebook. There, you can also find a map, which you can use to navigate the environment. However, be aware that you will actually have to navigate, as the map won't show your location. If you are near a landmark of interest, or have found something else you find interesting, you can take out your camera and snap a picture of it. These pictures will appear in your notebook.

Controls

W, A, S, D - move around

move mouse - look around

right mouse button - toggle camera mode

left mouse button - take photo (in camera mode)

esc / tab - open notebook
